title: U.S. soccer star Megan Rapinoe will retire at the end of the season
description: Megan Rapinoe will end her career having won at least two World Cups and one Olympic gold medal and having been awarded a Presidential Medal of Freedom.

title: A plane crash in Southern California kills 6 people near site of earlier fatal crash
description: The FAA and the NTSB are investigating after a Cessna business jet crashed in Riverside County and burst into flames. It's the second deadly crash near the same Riverside County airport within a week.

title: Dangerous heat waves will hit the Southwest and Florida over the next week
description: The National Weather Service has warned people in several cities, including Phoenix and Miami, to avoid the sun over the coming days as temperatures climb to life-threatening numbers.

title: Mark Cavendish crashes out of Tour de France, missing outright record for stage wins
description: Britain's ace sprinter will have to share the record for most career stage wins at the Tour de France. Competing in his final season, Cavendish crashed out of the race during the eighth stage.

title: More renters facing eviction have a right to a lawyer. Finding one can be hard
description: New laws aim to change the power imbalance in rent court, where tenants with no lawyer are more likely to lose. But some cities have a shortage of attorneys or no set way to pair them with renters.

title: An overdue library book makes a return trip to the shelves — 119 years later
description: There are overdue library books. Then there's An Elementary Treatise on Electricity, which was last checked out in Massachusetts in 1904. It finally made it back after being spotted in West Virginia.

title: Studying the link between the gut and mental health is personal for this scientist
description: Calliope Holingue researches how the microbiome and mind affect each other. She's part of a growing field, exploring how that connection could ultimately improve treatments for mental conditions.

title: Feinstein's return to the Senate recalls its past heroics and persistent problems
description: The 90-year-old Californian's long absence and current condition raise questions about the institution's ability to deal with its internal issues of aging or disability.

title: Shohei Ohtani's hometown in Japan knew he was a prodigy since Little League
description: "He made it big all due to his own efforts. We had nothing to do with it," Ohtani's former coach, Shoji Asari, says of the Los Angeles Angels' superstar. Asari emphasized fun over winning.

title: Canceled trips and no refunds: Passport delays are derailing travelers
description: In March, the State Department said the standard processing time for a new or renewed passport can take up to 13 weeks. But many passport seekers are finding that the wait is well beyond that.

title: Turkey's Erdogan hosts Zelenskyy and says Ukraine deserves membership in NATO
description: Erdogan's support for Ukraine comes as Turkey has been holding off giving final approval to Sweden joining NATO, saying Stockholm is not effectively cracking down on groups Ankara view as threats.

title: California's governor won't appeal parole of former Manson follower Leslie Van Houten
description: Van Houten, now in her 70s, is serving a life sentence for helping Charles Manson and other followers in the 1969 killings of Leno LaBianca, a grocer in Los Angeles, and his wife, Rosemary.
